mapper.update: update fproduct set repertory = #{repertory} where pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: select f.pid, f.pname, f.createDate, f.endDate, m.mname as mid, f.repertory, f.price, f.paddress, f.description, u.name as createBy from fproduct f join user u on u.id=f.createBy join merchant m on m.mid = f.mid where pid = #{pid}
select p.pname,m.mname as mid,p.createdate,p.paddress,p.price,p.repertory from fproduct p join merchant m on p.mid=m.mid where p.pid = #{pid}
